description: Creates a signaling channel. CreateSignalingChannel is an asynchronous operation.

parameters.name: ChannelName
parameters.description: A name for the signaling channel that you are creating. It must be unique for each Amazon Web Services account and Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: SingleMasterConfiguration
parameters.description: A structure containing the configuration for the SINGLE_MASTER channel type. MessageTtlSeconds (integer) --- The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

nested_params.name: MessageTtlSeconds
nested_params.description: The period of time a signaling channel retains undelivered messages before they are discarded.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A set of tags (key-value pairs) that you want to associate with this channel. (dict) --- A key and value pair that is associated with the specified signaling channel. The key of the tag that is associated with the specified signaling channel. The value of the tag that is associated with the specified signaling channel.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the tag that is associated with the specified signaling channel.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the tag that is associated with the specified signaling channel.

nested_items.name: ChannelARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created channel.
